title: error in prune state
body:
i run below command to prune state; however, it throws error
```
INFO [06-26|03:14:46.311] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [06-26|03:14:46.311] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
INFO [06-26|03:14:46.312] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
INFO [06-26|03:14:46.426] Using leveldb as the backing database
INFO [06-26|03:14:46.426] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/root/data/geth/chaindata cache=512.00MiB handles=51200
INFO [06-26|03:14:47.512] Using LevelDB as the backing database
INFO [06-26|03:14:47.541] Opened ancient database                  database=/root/data/geth/chaindata/ancient/chain readonly=false
WARN [06-26|03:14:47.561] Loaded snapshot journal                  diffs=missing
WARN [06-26|03:14:47.561] Failed to load snapshot                  err="head doesn't match snapshot: have 0x01e457462517521833ca153279ca0500658b768da307a4ea6869ae54585082ae, want 0xaca0dad0bb9b749942294f48205ce45b9a5425d8796c67ca43cffa3a0d21219b"
ERROR[06-26|03:14:47.561] Failed to open snapshot tree             err="head doesn't match snapshot: have 0x01e457462517521833ca153279ca0500658b768da307a4ea6869ae54585082ae, want 0xaca0dad0bb9b749942294f48205ce45b9a5425d8796c67ca43cffa3a0d21219b"
head doesn't match snapshot: have 0x01e457462517521833ca153279ca0500658b768da307a4ea6869ae54585082ae, want 0xaca0dad0bb9b749942294f48205ce45b9a5425d8796c67ca43cffa3a0d21219b
```

that's my command
```
geth snapshot prune-state --datadir /root/data --mainnet
```
